SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Urban Redevelopment Areas relative to the peak of Metropolitan Areas in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Urban Redevelopment Areas is to the {right} of the peak of Metropolitan Areas.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Metropolitan Areas show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Metropolitan Areas shows a {Single Peak Distribution}.

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Metropolitan Areas} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =900260.4?
EVJ.A: At X =900260.4,the label with the highest density is {Urban Redevelopment Areas}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 323540? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Luxury Residences}'s peak at {446446},{Urban Redevelopment Areas}'s peak at {333392}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 699010? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Luxury Residences}'s peak at {446446},{Metropolitan Areas}'s peak at {105105},{Urban Redevelopment Areas}'s peak at {333392},{Coastal Properties}'s peak at {88088}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Metropolitan Areas or Urban Redevelopment Areas?
NC.A: {Urban Redevelopment Areas} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Luxury Residences or Coastal Properties?
NC.A: {Luxury Residences} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Urban Redevelopment Areas or Luxury Residences?
NC.A: {Luxury Residences} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {0} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Metropolitan Areas}
